channel.title: Adding NPC's
channel.description:
Hello Mopar fourms, I know this is a very newbie question but "How exactlly do I add NPC's to my source?" If you can help please do, Thanks
EDIT (good idea al :p): I do have an autospawn.cfg but I cannot edit into it, also I have many files such as NPClist.java, NPChandler.java, NPCdrops.java and so on. I am using frigment v3 for my base if that helps.

item.title: Adding NPC's
item.dc:creator: @frugoo_scape frugoo scape
item.description:
@frugoo_scape wrote:

[quote=“Owner god-of-war, post:1, topic:235413”]Hello Mopar fourms, I know this is a very newbie question but “How exactlly do I add NPC’s to my source?”
If you can help please do, Thanks[/quote]
There might be an autospawn.cnf or something like that in your project directory? Edit this file to add npcs. You can learn the structure of how to add another one by reading over how other nps were added etc… I’m not sure, all sources are different. You should of provided this information with your question.

Read full topic
